column6: Hello! I'm VirtualCarolyn. Take a minute to introduce yourselves.
While I won't answer your questions directly, I can help guide your group discussion.
Once you get an idea of what's going on, replace these prompts with something domain appropriate!
You can also share images to the whiteboard:
The agent is listening for several kinds of triggers to start supporting students.
For example, David cares a lot about "Accountable Talk" style facilitation these days.

The provided AT example is configured for college chemistry. If you've turned on any of the revoice, agree, say_more, or explain conditions, try saying something like "boiling point increases with dipole moment."
(and then wait a little while, this behavior waits for other students to follow up before offering support.)
